CustomField.formula: IF (TEXT(RTL_Contact_Status__c) = 'New', $Label.RTL_Campaign_Member_Filter_Offer_Pending, IF( OR( TEXT(RTL_Contact_Status__c) = 'Unused', TEXT(RTL_Contact_Status__c) = 'Close', RTL_Count_Offer_Product__c = 0), 'N/A', IF( RTL_Count_Interest__c+RTL_Count_Not_Interest__c+RTL_Count_NA__c < RTL_Count_Offer_Product__c , $Label.RTL_Campaign_Member_Filter_Offer_Pending , IF( RTL_Count_Interest__c>0 , $Label.RTL_Campaign_Member_Filter_Offer_Interest, IF( RTL_Count_Referred__c>0 , $Label.RTL_Campaign_Member_Filter_Offer_Referred, IF( RTL_Count_Not_Interest__c >0, $Label.RTL_Campaign_Member_Filter_Offer_NotInterest, 'N/A' ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Offer Result
